// Alert when network interfaces show sustained error rates (>5 errors/sec or >0.5% of packets).
// Excludes loopback/container interfaces, enforces minimum traffic, and clamps counter resets.
// Tune thresholds in the final WHERE clause for your environment.
FROM metrics-system.network-*
| WHERE `system.network.name` NOT RLIKE "^(lo|docker|veth|br-)"
| STATS
  max_in_errors  = MAX(`system.network.in.errors`::LONG),
  min_in_errors  = MIN(`system.network.in.errors`::LONG),
  max_out_errors = MAX(`system.network.out.errors`::LONG),
  min_out_errors = MIN(`system.network.out.errors`::LONG),
  max_in_packets = MAX(`system.network.in.packets`::LONG),
  min_in_packets = MIN(`system.network.in.packets`::LONG),
  max_out_packets = MAX(`system.network.out.packets`::LONG),
  min_out_packets = MIN(`system.network.out.packets`::LONG),
  first_ts = MIN(@timestamp),
  last_ts  = MAX(@timestamp)
  BY `host.name`, `system.network.name`
| EVAL elapsed_ms  = TO_DOUBLE(TO_LONG(last_ts) - TO_LONG(first_ts))
| EVAL elapsed_sec = CASE(elapsed_ms > 0, elapsed_ms / 1000.0, 0.0)
| WHERE elapsed_sec >= 60
| EVAL in_error_delta   = CASE(max_in_errors  >= min_in_errors,  max_in_errors  - min_in_errors,  0)
| EVAL out_error_delta  = CASE(max_out_errors >= min_out_errors, max_out_errors - min_out_errors, 0)
| EVAL in_packet_delta  = CASE(max_in_packets >= min_in_packets, max_in_packets - min_in_packets, 0)
| EVAL out_packet_delta = CASE(max_out_packets >= min_out_packets, max_out_packets - min_out_packets, 0)
| EVAL total_packets = in_packet_delta + out_packet_delta
| WHERE total_packets >= 1000
| EVAL in_error_rate  = CASE(elapsed_sec > 0, in_error_delta  / elapsed_sec, 0.0)
| EVAL out_error_rate = CASE(elapsed_sec > 0, out_error_delta / elapsed_sec, 0.0)
| EVAL in_error_pct  = CASE(in_packet_delta  > 100, 100.0 * in_error_delta  / TO_DOUBLE(in_packet_delta),  0.0)
| EVAL out_error_pct = CASE(out_packet_delta > 100, 100.0 * out_error_delta / TO_DOUBLE(out_packet_delta), 0.0)
| WHERE in_error_rate > 5
  OR out_error_rate > 5
  OR in_error_pct  > 0.5
  OR out_error_pct > 0.5
